definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="163" y="68"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_issneaking"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems_oredictionary"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">forge:wobr_knife</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="item_nbt_logic_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Cooldown</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_singular_ops"><field name="OP">ROUNDUP</field><value name="NUM"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">amount</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
